description: Make a delicious green noodle curry that's loaded with veg in only 30 minutes. This creamy curry is topped with crispy fried onion and is perfect for a quick dinner.
name: Green Noodle Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide noodles and remaining spinach among bowls, then spoon over curry. Top with shoots and shallots. Spoon over remaining cream and serve with lime.
